path.style: fill: none; stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-width: 4.5px; stroke-dashoffset: 0px; stroke: rgb(0, 128, 255);
fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-width: 3px; stroke-dashoffset: 0px;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 170, 170); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-width: 3px; stroke-dashoffset: 0px;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 170, 170); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-width: 3px; stroke-dashoffset: 0px;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 170, 170); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-width: 3px; stroke-dashoffset: 0px;
fill: none; stroke: rgb(255, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 1; stroke-miterlimit: 4; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke-width: 2.45324px; stroke-dashoffset: 0px;
